scripts.build: rm assets/blog_list.json && sh utils/track_posts.sh >> assets/blog_list.json && nuxt build
scripts.dev: rm assets/blog_list.json && sh utils/track_posts.sh >> assets/blog_list.json && nuxt dev
scripts.generate: rm assets/blog_list.json && sh utils/track_posts.sh >> assets/blog_list.json && nuxt generate
scripts.preview: rm assets/blog_list.json && sh utils/track_posts.sh >> assets/blog_list.json &&nuxt preview
scripts.postinstall: rm assets/blog_list.json && sh utils/track_posts.sh >> assets/blog_list.json &&nuxt prepare
